name: PrayerTime
0:
”Alexa, open muslim prayer”
”Alexa, play muslim prayer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: muslim prayer
des:
The skill plays the Athan / Adhan / Adan (Muslim call to prayer) when prompted. 

**IMPORTANT : Please note that the skill only plays the Adhan when the skill is manually started or if its setup to run using an Alexa Routine within the Alexa app that is triggered at a given time or by a third party app.

Note : The skill content is in Arabic i.e. the skill plays the Adhan / Athan / Azan in the Arabic language.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
